article:
'Benacre Broad' is an isolated body of water on the North Sea coast of the
English county of Suffolk. It is located in the parish of Benacre, Suffolk about
south of Lowestoft and north of Southwold. The village of Covehithe is just to
the south, Kessingland to the north.

The broad is part of Benacre National Nature Reserve, a reserve managed by
Natural England. [http://www.naturalengland.org.uk/ourwor-
k/conservation/designations/nnr/1006015.aspx Benacre NNR], Natural England.
Retrieved 2012-11-01.
